content: this stuffed football is so cute and fun you can use it as a cute room/desk decoration a baby gift a gift for an avid football fan or a toy have fun tossing it around it s soft so it can be played with inside as well as outside materials 4 00mm g hook worsted weight yarn in brown i used loops & threads impeccable yarn in chocolate worsted weight yarn in white i used loops & threads impeccable yarn in white fiberfill tapestry needle for sewing and weaving in ends scissors
